turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, Assistant. I'm in the mood for pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what kind of pizza would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: My favorite Pizza Hut.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is this for delivery or carry out?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's for carry out.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of pizza would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like pepperoni and italian sausage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of crust would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ultimate cheesy crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have any special requests?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure. I'd like extra marinara sauce.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any other requests?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, a large pepperoni and Italian sausage ultimate cheesy crust pizza with extra marinara sauce will be be $15.89. Would you like to add this to your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to order anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your total will be $17.04. The pizza will be ready for pickup in 20 to 25 minutes. Would you like to place your order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been placed. It will be ready to pickup in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
